question: I am not alive, but I can grow and die. I have no lungs, but I need air. I have no mouth, but I can be put out. What am I?
I'm covered in tiny squares, but I'm not a game you play. I quietly eat your days, turning future into yesterday. When my last page is finished, a new me will appear. What am I?

I can turn a promise into a threat without changing a single word.
I decide whether "Nice job" is praise or quiet rage.
I live in where, when, and who — not in what is said.
Without me, jokes don’t land, rules don’t hold, and data has no edge.
What am I?
